titles.title: Expressing appreciation and support for essential employees with disabilities during the current pandemic, and beyond.
Expressing appreciation and support for essential employees with disabilities during the current pandemic, and beyond.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes essential employees with disabilities for their efforts during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
